title: AGIJobs Economic Power Launch

controls.description: Owner reduces maximum job duration to enforce faster settlement loops and higher capital velocity.
Owner increases validator quorum for premium workstreams to maintain uncompromising trust levels.
Owner upgrades fiat on/off-ramp adapter with improved slippage guarantees.

circuitBreakers.description: Pause contracts if validator confidence slips below 95% to protect settlement integrity.
Recalibrate automation if orchestration coverage drops under 80%.
Trigger treasury forensic audit when buffers fall below the defensive floor.

upgradePaths.description: Ships the hardened JobRegistry bundle with deterministic migration plan.
Activates the upgraded validator commit–reveal consensus parameters.
Rebalances stake requirements to throttle spam and fortify incentives.

parameterControls.description: Owner reduces maximum job duration to enforce faster settlement loops and higher capital velocity.
Owner increases validator quorum for premium workstreams to maintain uncompromising trust levels.
Owner upgrades fiat on/off-ramp adapter with improved slippage guarantees.

circuitBreakers.description: Pause contracts if validator confidence slips below 95% to protect settlement integrity.
Recalibrate automation if orchestration coverage drops under 80%.
Trigger treasury forensic audit when buffers fall below the defensive floor.

upgradePaths.description: Ships the hardened JobRegistry bundle with deterministic migration plan.
Activates the upgraded validator commit–reveal consensus parameters.
Rebalances stake requirements to throttle spam and fortify incentives.

ownerCommandPlan.coverageNarrative: Coverage below defensive target – prioritise scripting additional command hooks.

modules.name: JobRegistry
modules.description: Primary registry coordinating job lifecycle, escrow, and agent authorization gates.

modules.name: StakeManager
modules.description: Manages agent and validator staking positions, slashing, and economic alignment loops.

modules.name: ValidationModule
modules.description: Commit–reveal validator consensus spine enforcing deliverable correctness.

modules.name: ReputationEngine
modules.description: Aggregates performance signals to prioritise elite agents and validators in the matching fabric.

modules.name: DisputeModule
modules.description: Escalation and arbitration flow for contested deliverables with automated jury selection.

modules.name: CertificateNFT
modules.description: Mints proof-of-completion artefacts for employers and downstream compliance attestations.
